article: Every year,millions of Monarch Butterflies  fly 4,000 km from Canada _ Mexico and then 4,000 _ again. They stay in Mexico for over six months, from October to April, _ it is cold in Canada during(...) that time. In Mexico, they lay eggs  and then die . In _ , the new butterflies start to fly back to Canada . There, they die _ they lay eggs. Then the _ butterflies fly to Mexico again. Monarch Butterflies always go to the same places in Mexico and to the _ trees. How do they know the _ ? Why do they go to the same trees? Only Monarch Butterflies know.
